channel.title: Compiler: 3 Errors Found Need Help Please!
channel.description:
I add this tut http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,35828.0.html (My Varrock Square) and I got these error message:
(NOTE:I use TestScape) [code]client.java:9088: ')' expected { ^
client.java:10583: illegal start of expression } ^
client.java:14531: ';' expected ^
3 errors Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Press any key to continue[/code]
please help me understand what these mean and help me fix them! Thanks Guys!

item.title: Compiler: 3 Errors Found Need Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @Lamez Lamez
item.description:
@Lamez wrote:

ok do you have some kind of compiler of some sort that I can use to find these lines?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 08, 2006, 12:12:34 AM[/size][hr]The Lines Glowed

                    teleportToX = 2680;
		teleportToY = 3425;
	}

		teleportToY = 3425;
	}
	else if (absY >= 10112)
	{
		sendMessage("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness.");
	}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("barrows")

		MainHelpMenu();

		sendMessage("There are currently "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+" players!");
	} else if (command.startsWith("mypos")) {
		sendMessage("You are standing on X="+absX+" Y="+absY+" Your Height="+heightLevel);
		sendMessage("CurrentX: "+currentX+" CurrentY: "+currentY);
	} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("backup")) {
		savechar();
	} else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) {
		PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5);
